creator: Robert_Flaherty@Hyperion.com
text:
C:\Tools\jakarta-slide-webdavclient-bin-2.0beta1\bin>run -d 
http://localhost:8080/slide
connect http://localhost:8080/slide
Mar 16, 2004 10:57:05 AM org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase 
processAuthenticationResponse
WARNING: No credentials available for the 'Slide DAV Server' authentication 
realm at localhost
UserName: root
Password:
The debug flag is on.
[LOCALHOST] /slide/ $ cc history
[LOCALHOST] /slide/history/ $ ls
1
[LOCALHOST] /slide/history/ $ cc 1
Fatal Error: unexpected char:
antlr.TokenStreamRecognitionException: unexpected char:
        at org.apache.webdav.cmd.ClientLexer.nextToken(ClientLexer.java:209)
        at antlr.TokenBuffer.fill(TokenBuffer.java:61)
        at antlr.TokenBuffer.LT(TokenBuffer.java:75)
        at antlr.LLkParser.LT(LLkParser.java:53)
        at org.apache.webdav.cmd.ClientParser.cd(ClientParser.java:932)
        at org.apache.webdav.cmd.ClientParser.command(ClientParser.java:277)
        at org.apache.webdav.cmd.ClientParser.commands(ClientParser.java:170)
        at org.apache.webdav.cmd.Client.run(Client.java:112)
        at org.apache.webdav.cmd.Slide.main(Slide.java:84)
Please, email to slide-user@jakarta.apache.org
Fixed in release and HEAD branch. Will be part of RC1
creator: ozeigermann@c1-fse.de
